## `SelectWindow` {#batch-selectwindow}

Selects a window in the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SelectWindow(SideBarSection section,
             number windowId = -1)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`SideBarSection`](#sidebarsection) section | The section of the project that the window is. |
| `number` windowId | (Optional) The ID of the window to select. |

### See also {-}

[`Application.GetTestId()`](#gettestid)
:::
